member.name: T:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants
member.summary: Flags controlling how the Image List item is drawn

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_NORMAL
member.summary: Draw item normally.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_TRANSPARENT
member.summary: Draw item transparently.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_BLEND25
member.summary: Draw item blended with 25% of the specified foreground colour or the Highlight colour if no foreground colour specified.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_SELECTED
member.summary: Draw item blended with 50% of the specified foreground colour or the Highlight colour if no foreground colour specified.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_MASK
member.summary: Draw the icon's mask

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_IMAGE
member.summary: Draw the icon image without using the mask

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_ROP
member.summary: Draw the icon using the ROP specified.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_PRESERVEALPHA
member.summary: Preserves the alpha channel in dest. XP only.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_SCALE
member.summary: Scale the image to cx, cy instead of clipping it. XP only.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants.ILD_DPISCALE
member.summary: Scale the image to the current DPI of the display. XP only.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants
member.summary: Enumeration containing XP ImageList Draw State options

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants.ILS_NORMAL
member.summary: The image state is not modified.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants.ILS_GLOW
member.summary: Adds a glow effect to the icon, which causes the icon to appear to glow with a given color around the edges. (Note: does not appear to be implemented)

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants.ILS_SHADOW
member.summary: Adds a drop shadow effect to the icon. (Note: does not appear to be implemented)

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants.ILS_SATURATE
member.summary: Saturates the icon by increasing each color component of the RGB triplet for each pixel in the icon. (Note: only ever appears to result in a completely unsaturated icon)

member.name: F:Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants.ILS_ALPHA
member.summary: Alpha blends the icon. Alpha blending controls the transparency level of an icon, according to the value of its alpha channel. (Note: does not appear to be implemented).

member.name: M:Raccoom.Win32.SystemImageList.DrawImage(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws an image

member.name: M:Raccoom.Win32.SystemImageList.DrawImage(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants)
member.summary: Draws an image using the specified flags

member.name: M:Raccoom.Win32.SystemImageList.DrawImage(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws an image using the specified flags and specifies the size to clip to (or to stretch to if ILD_SCALE is provided).

member.name: M:Raccoom.Win32.SystemImageList.DrawImage(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawItemConstants,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color,Raccoom.Win32.ImageListDrawStateConstants,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draws an image using the specified flags and state on XP systems.
member.param: Fore colour to blend with when using the ILD_SELECTED or ILD_BLEND25 flags
If stateFlags include ILS_GLOW, then the colour to use for the glow effect. Otherwise if stateFlags includes ILS_SHADOW, then the colour to use for the shadow.
If stateFlags includes ILS_ALPHA, then the alpha component is applied to the icon. Otherwise if ILS_SATURATE is included, then the (R,G,B) components are used to saturate the image.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes
member.summary: Defines the DriveTypes used for Win32_LogicalDisk.This enumeration can be treated as a bit field, that is, a set of flags.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.All
member.summary: All drive types

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.NoRootDirectory
member.summary: NoRootDirectory

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.RemovableDisk
member.summary: Drive has removable media. This includes all floppy drives and many other varieties of storage devices.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.LocalDisk
member.summary: Drive has fixed (nonremovable) media. This includes all hard drives, including hard drives that are removable.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.NetworkDrive
member.summary: Network drives. This includes drives shared anywhere on a network.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.CompactDisc
member.summary: Drive is a CD-ROM. No distinction is made between read-only and read/write CD-ROM drives.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.DriveTypes.RAMDisk
member.summary: Drive is a block of Random Access Memory (RAM) on the local computer that behaves like a disk drive.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes
member.summary: Defines the DriveTypes used for Win32_LogicalDisk.This enumeration can anot be treated as a bit field

member.summary: Drive has fixed (nonremovable) media. This includes all hard drives, including hard drives that are removable.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.NetworkDrive
member.summary: Network drives. This includes drives shared anywhere on a network.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.CompactDisc
member.summary: Drive is a CD-ROM. No distinction is made between read-only and read/write CD-ROM drives.

member.name: F:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.Win32_LogicalDiskDriveTypes.RAMDisk
member.summary: Drive is a block of Random Access Memory (RAM) on the local computer that behaves like a disk drive.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.TreeStrategyFolderBrowserProviderBase
member.summary: TreeStrategyFolderBrowserProviderBase defines the common FolderBrowser environment and can be used for all Shell32ImageList based folder browser components to display folder and files associated with Windows Explorer like Icons.

member.name: T:Raccoom.Windows.Forms.TreeStrategySystemFolderBrowserProviderBase
member.summary: TreeStrategySystemFolderBrowserProviderBase extends TreeStrategyFolderBrowserProviderBase and can be used for folder browser components which shows the local machine drive types. The class uses WMI LogicalDisk classes to enumerate the machine local drives. The clue is that you can specifiy which drives types to include into the query, this way you can set a filter and show only Removable Drives or Local hard disk drives.
